thread.title: Man killed, pregnant woman and child injured in Northern Cape crash
thread.title_full: Man killed, pregnant woman and child injured in Northern Cape crash | News24

author: news24.com
title: Man killed, pregnant woman and child injured in Northern Cape crash
text:
Johannesburg - A man died while a pregnant woman and a 3-year-old child were injured when a car overturned in Batlharos near Kuruman in the Northern Cape, paramedics said on Thursday.
The man, 37, was believed to have been driving the car with the woman and child as passengers when he lost control, ER24 spokesperson Chitra Bodasing said.
The man was thrown from the car when it overturned.
ER24 paramedics and other emergency services found the man under the car when they arrived at the scene.
